name: mern-typescript-template
description: A comprehensive MERN stack template with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and purple theme

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules server/dist client/dist

author: MERN Template
